name: Moon Escape
description:
Moon Escape it's a card matching game consisting of 10 different levels. You crashed your buggy on the moon and have to complete a various tasks to make your way back home. There are time limits, secret codes and viruses to defeat, so brace yourself to win them all and try to hit that 100 points mark.

This is my very first game that has been made for the Game Off 2020 and I'd be over the 'moon' if you can post a screenshot of beating the 100 points.

Credits to the following:

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com
